text: The Brutalist is a 2024 epic period drama movie directed and produced by Brady Corbet. ==Plot== It is about a Hungarian-born Jewish architect who survives the Holocaust and emigrates to the United States, where he has a hard time until a rich client changes his life. ==Cast== The movies stars Adrien Brody as László Tóth, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce, Joe Alwyn, Raffey Cassidy, Stacy Martin, Emma Laird, Isaach de Bankolé and Alessandro Nivola. ==References== Category:Holocaust movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:2020s epic movies Category:2024 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:American epic movies Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:American drama movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Movies set in Philadelphia
title: The Brutalist
